ComicInfo.Summary: A new chapter of this best-selling S&M series. Still on her journey through Europe, Vicki Faith is aboard a train with a ticket to go all the way. She is again snared by her assistant, Lisa, for some unfinished business. Vicki learns what it is like to have her ticket punched again and again. More bondage adventures with Vicki Faith and all of the gang from master artist Pretorious.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:00:22. [CVDB249353] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:54:00. [Issue ID 768286]
